Scene in the new burlesque farce of Much Ado about Nothing, or the Metropolitan Police Bill as played in the green room of the State play=house. Dogberry 1st Investigator ... Mr. Blacking. Verges 2nd Investigator ... Mr. Largely. For minor characters see daily press. NB In preparation of the comic farce of Removing the State=House to a rural district.
